comments.en: This driver probably does not work, because the printer only supports 300/600/1200 dpi. We use this driver and it seems to work. Change dpi to 600, 1200 doesnt work. Anyway, it prints very slow!
This driver probably does not work, because the printer only supports 300/600/1200 dpi.
